products.name: Rosii Cirio Diced Tomatoes
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Fruits and vegetables based foods, Canned foods, Vegetables based foods, Canned plant-based foods, Vegetables, Canned vegetables, Tomatoes and their products, Tomatoes, Canned tomatoes, Tomato pulps
products.labels: Made in Italy, No added sugar, Nutriscore, Nutriscore Grade A, fr:Saveurs de l'Année
products.facts: ["Rosii Cirio Diced Tomatoes are made from 100% Italian tomatoes, ensuring high quality and authentic flavor.","The tomatoes are harvested at peak ripeness, which helps to preserve their natural sweetness and nutritional value.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting eco-friendliness and reducing environmental impact.","Cirio follows sustainable farming practices, ensuring that their tomato production supports biodiversity and soil health."]

products.name: Erdnussbutter, creamy
products.facts: ["Erdnussbutter, creamy - 400 g is primarily made from roasted peanuts, which are a good source of protein and healthy fats.","The product is often packaged in recyclable materials, promoting sustainability and reducing environmental impact.","Quality standards for Erdnussbutter include being free from artificial preservatives and trans fats, ensuring a healthier option for consumers.","Many brands source their peanuts from sustainable farms, helping to support eco-friendly agricultural practices."]

products.name: Skyr  nature
products.facts: ["Skyr is a traditional Icelandic dairy product made from skim milk and has a high protein content.","It is set with live cultures, which contribute to its probiotic benefits and creamy texture.","Skyr production has a low environmental impact due to its efficient use of milk and minimal waste.","The quality of Skyr is often determined by the use of natural ingredients and the absence of artificial additives."]
